actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 102-736.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 427.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit regulations waiving yield restrictions on tax-exempt bond arbitrage if the arbitrage rebate requirements are met.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit regulations waiving yield restrictions on tax-exempt bond arbitrage if certain arbitrage rebate requirements are met.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit regulations waiving yield restrictions on tax-exempt bond arbitrage if the arbitrage rebate requirements are met.
